description: This file defines a Flutter widget called AddParticipantSheet, which displays a list of contacts to invite a user into an ongoing call by selecting from the contacts list.

classes.name: AddParticipantSheet
classes.description: A Flutter widget that shows a bottom sheet allowing users to select contacts to invite into a call.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the AddParticipantSheet, displaying a list of contacts with an option to invite each to the call.
